title: Digital Repository Construction and Utilization for Summer Internship Project Reports

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Open-source tool-based report management system development competency enhancement in smartphone-limited technology settings

learning_goals: The ability to install and perform basic configurations of digital repositories using Greenstone software
The ability to systematically classify and upload report files according to metadata input standards
The ability to efficiently extract required materials using repository search functions on mobile devices

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
